member.name: T:Divelements.Navisight.Rendering.Office2003ColorScheme
member.summary: A colour scheme to be used with the Office 2003 renderer.

member.name: F:Divelements.Navisight.Rendering.Office2003ColorScheme.Automatic
member.summary: The renderer will use the current Windows XP theme if available, otherwise fall back to standard Windows colours.

member.name: F:Divelements.Navisight.Rendering.Office2003ColorScheme.Standard
member.summary: The renderer will use standard windows colours.

member.name: F:Divelements.Navisight.Rendering.Office2003ColorScheme.LunaBlue
member.summary: The renderer will use colours from the Luna Blue theme in Windows XP.

member.name: F:Divelements.Navisight.Rendering.Office2003ColorScheme.LunaOlive
member.summary: The renderer will use colours from the Luna Olive theme in Windows XP.

member.name: F:Divelements.Navisight.Rendering.Office2003ColorScheme.LunaSilver
member.summary: The renderer will use colours from the Luna Silver theme in Windows XP.

member.name: T:Divelements.Navisight.Rendering.INavisightRenderer
member.summary: Provides a template for a class that will renderer the visual controls in this library.

member.summary: Defines what type of animation is used to switch visually between categories.

member.summary: The active category slides between views fast then slow.

member.name: F:Divelements.Navisight.CategoryChangeAnimation.SlowThenFast
member.summary: The active category slides between views slow then fast.

member.name: F:Divelements.Navisight.CategoryChangeAnimation.None
member.summary: No animation is performed.

member.summary: Defines how the text of a button is laid out relative to the image.

member.summary: The text is positioned next to the image.

member.name: F:Divelements.Navisight.ButtonTextAlignment.Underneath
member.summary: The text is positioned underneath the image.

member.summary: Defines how the highlight of a button is drawn relative to its contents.

member.summary: The whole button is encompassed by the highlight.

member.name: F:Divelements.Navisight.ButtonHighlightMode.ImageOnly
member.summary: Only the image is encompassed by the highlight.

member.summary: Causes the button to adopt the specified bounds.

The outer bounds of the button, which will be used to draw the highlight and catch mouse movement.

Whether to lay out child items in right-to-left mode.

member.summary: The text associated with the button.
